name: HSP_ACCT_BILL_NOTE
description: This table contains hospital account billing notes from the Hospital Accounts Receivable (HAR) master file.

columns.name: HSP_ACCOUNT_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the hospital account.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: This column stores the line number in the results of a query. As multiple billing notes can be placed on one hospital account, each billing note will have a unique line number.

columns.name: BILLING_NOTE
columns.description: The text of a billing note associated with the hospital account.
